Class.ClassComment: DOMCategory /** * Category class which adds GPath style operations to Java's DOM classes. * @author sam * @author paulk */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Whether text content is trimmed (removing leading and trailing whitespace); default false. WARNING: this is a global setting. Altering it will affect all DOMCategory usage within the current Java process. It is not recommended that this is altered; instead call the trim() method on the returned text, but the flag is available to support legacy Groovy behavior. * @param trimWhitespace the new value */

/** * Whether ignorable whitespace (e.g. whitespace between elements) is kept (default false). WARNING: this is a global setting. Altering it will affect all DOMCategory usage within the current Java process. * @param keepIgnorableWhitespace the new value */
/** * Returns the list of any direct String nodes of this node. * @return the list of String values from this node * @since 2.3.0 */
